wikipedia_page.main: James Arthur Sinclair (born 31 July 1957) is a Scottish former footballer who made over 350 appearances in the Scottish League, most notably for Queen's Park and Clyde. He also played for Queen of the South, Stirling Albion and Hamilton Academical. Sinclair later entered youth coaching with the Scottish Football Association, Rangers and Queen's Park and briefly served as assistant manager at Aston Villa.

response: * Jimmy Sinclair (footballer) (born 1957), Scottish footballer and coach
